meanings.definition: To speak beforehand or in advance.
meanings.sent1: She always forespeaks her plans before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: He forespeaks the weather forecast accurately.
meanings.sent3: The cat forespeaking the dog's barking was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition forespeaks the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent5: Forespeaking the dangers ahead, he warned his friends to be cautious.

meanings.definition: The act of predicting or foretelling.
meanings.sent1: His forespeaking of the future events was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The book contains many instances of forespeaking.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller's forespeaking made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ancient artifact seemed to hold the power of forespeaking.
meanings.sent5: The elders in the village were known for their forespeaking abilities.
